channel.title: How do you change where new chacters spawn
channel.description: How do you change where new chacters spawn, and also how do you change where you spawn after you die? thanks,[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 03:51:46 PM[/size][hr]helooooo?

item.title: How do you change where new chacters spawn
item.dc:creator: @im_a_beast im a beast
item.description:
@im_a_beast wrote:

go into “Player” and search for “pBeard=8;” and u will see coordinates but make sure there the ones when u log in… so make a new account and see them… and if they match the ones in “Player” then thats ur solution… change it to what u want and there problem solved

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change where new chacters spawn

item.title: How do you change where new chacters spawn
item.dc:creator: @liamrob liamrob
item.description:
@liamrob wrote:

Hang on i’ll post it just gotta type it.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 04:58:20 PM[/size][hr]search for this

removeAllItems();

then under it you’ll see

//teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("What ever your dying message is"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

And the coordinate you change. For the start I think it’s same for dying hang on.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 05:02:09 PM[/size][hr]Nah I think thats It. Otherwise If it ain’t the same i’ll try find it.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 05:05:21 PM[/size][hr]Don’t forget to REP+++

Read full topic
